voices.name: Sarah (Professional Female)
voices.description: Clear, authoritative female voice. Perfect for B2B and corporate demos.
voices.sample: Sample: This is Sarah, a professional female voice perfect for your product demo.

voices.name: David (Professional Male)
voices.description: Deep, confident male voice. Great for enterprise and SaaS products.
voices.sample: Sample: This is David, a professional male voice ideal for business presentations.

voices.name: Emma (Energetic Female)
voices.description: Upbeat, enthusiastic female voice. Perfect for Product Hunt launches and social media.
voices.sample: Sample: Hey! This is Emma, bringing energy and excitement to your product launch!

voices.name: Mike (Casual Male)
voices.description: Friendly, conversational male voice. Great for consumer apps and casual products.
voices.sample: Sample: What's up? I'm Mike, here to make your product sound approachable and fun.

voices.name: Olivia (British Female)
voices.description: Elegant British accent. Adds sophistication to your product presentation.
voices.sample: Sample: Hello, I'm Olivia. I bring a touch of British elegance to your demos.

voices.name: Jack (Australian Male)
voices.description: Laid-back Australian accent. Perfect for friendly, approachable brands.
voices.sample: Sample: G'day! I'm Jack, bringing a relaxed Aussie vibe to your product story.

voices.name: Priya (Indian Female)
voices.description: Clear Indian accent. Great for tech and SaaS products with global appeal.
voices.sample: Sample: Hello, I'm Priya. I deliver clear, professional narration for your tech products.

voices.name: Tyler (Young Male)
voices.description: Youthful, energetic male voice. Perfect for startups and innovative products.
voices.sample: Sample: Yo! I'm Tyler, bringing that startup energy to your product launch!

speedOptions.label: Slower (0.75x)
speedOptions.description: Better for complex products or non-native speakers

speedOptions.label: Normal (1.0x)
speedOptions.description: Standard speaking pace - works for most demos

speedOptions.label: Faster (1.25x)
speedOptions.description: Fit more content - great for short social videos
